live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
42264.summary: customers on Gabriola Island are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
42264.title: Sept 24 – Gabriola Island | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
